Setting.Name: DashboardBackend###0501-Complemento1
Setting.Description: Parameters for the dashboard backend of the new tickets overview of the agent interface. "Limit" is the number of entries shown by default. "Group" is used to restrict the access to the plugin (e. g. Group: admin;group1;group2;). "Default" determines if the plugin is enabled by default or if the user needs to enable it manually. "CacheTTLLocal" is the cache time in minutes for the plugin.

Setting.Name: DashboardBackend###001-ComplementoOverview
Setting.Description: Overview of the tickets in specific queues. "CacheTTLLocal" is the cache time in minutes for the plugin.

Hash.Item: Overview of the current tickets in the system

Setting.Name: Loader::Agent::CommonCSS###010-ComplementoDashboards
Setting.Description: List of JS files to always be loaded for the agent interface.

Hash.Item: Today - Tickets that will escalate today
Tomorrow - Tickets that will escalate tomorrow
Next week - Tickets that will escalate next week
Solution Escalated - Tickets already escalated Solution Time
Solution Today - Tickets that will escalate today Solution Time
Solution Tomorrow - Tickets that will escalate tomorrow Solution Time
Solution Next week - Tickets that will escalate next week Solution Time
Response Escalated - Tickets already escalated Response Time
Response Today - Tickets that will escalate today Response Time
Response Tomorrow - Tickets that will escalate tomorrow Response Time
Response Next week - Tickets that will escalate next week Response Time
Update Escalated - Tickets already escalated Update Time
Update Today - Tickets that will escalate today Update Time
Update Tomorrow - Tickets that will escalate tomorrow Update Time
Update Next week - Tickets that will escalate next week Update Time
resumeAlert - A Class that changes the font color to red
resumeSmallAlert - A Class that changes the font color to red with small font
Accounted Time by CustomerID this Month
Stacked Column - Free X and Y Axis

Setting.Name: Loader::Agent::CommonCSS###3337-tagEditor
Setting.Description: List of CSS files to always be loaded for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Loader::Agent::CommonJS###3337-tagEditor
Setting.Description: List of JS files to always be loaded for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: Loader::Agent::CommonJS###4444-CpDashboards
Setting.Description: List of JS files to always be loaded for the agent interface.

Array.Item: Consider also tickets without defined SLA (AllTickets=1)
Escalation Key. Use SolutionDiffInMin or FirstResponseDiffInMin (EscalationKey=SolutionDiffInMin)
Enable the usage of DynamicFields as y or x Axis, it can'reduce system performance (DynamicFields=1)
Show only last part of name cutting on :: (CutName=1)
Enable the usage of DynamicFields as y or x Axis, it can'reduce system performance (DynamicFields=1)
Show only last part of name cutting on :: (CutName=1)
Tickets Closed in the Current Month (ClosedThisMonth)
Only show Tickets of the user which is seeing the dashboard (MyTickets=1)
Only show Tickets of user custom queues (MyQueues=1)

Setting.Name: Daemon::SchedulerCronTaskManager::Task###CreateZabbixDashBoardGraph
Setting.Description: Delete expired cache from core modules.
